HERO.SUBTITLE: GreenPathAI, the AI guiding you to local, authentic, and eco-friendly tours tailored to your desires.
HERO.CHAT_BUBBLE_TEXT: Hi! What can I do for you?

CHAT.TRANSFERRED: You have been transferred to: Jordano Fring.

ECO_RESPONSABILITY.TITLE: ECO-RESPONSIBILITY
ECO_RESPONSABILITY.DESC: We prioritize low environmental impact routes and support the local economy.

AUTHENTIC_MEETINGS.TITLE: AUTHENTIC MEETINGS
AUTHENTIC_MEETINGS.DESC: Human experiences at the heart of communities, with engaged local guides and partners.

UNIQUE_DESTINATIONS.TITLE: UNIQUE DESTINATIONS
UNIQUE_DESTINATIONS.DESC: Original tours, off the beaten path, selected for their biodiversity and culture.

SOCIAL_ENGAGEMENT.TITLE: SOCIAL ENGAGEMENT
SOCIAL_ENGAGEMENT.DESC: Each trip contributes to concrete social or environmental projects on site.

ECO_FRIENDLY_ACCOMMODATION.TITLE: ECO-FRIENDLY ACCOMMODATION
ECO_FRIENDLY_ACCOMMODATION.DESC: Stay in labeled and environmentally respectful establishments.

QUALITY_GUARANTEE.TITLE: QUALITY GUARANTEE & FAIR PRICE
QUALITY_GUARANTEE.DESC: Transparent service, fair prices, and traveler satisfaction at the core of our priorities.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Testimonials
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_1: "A meaningful trip, breathtaking landscapes, and the certainty of acting for the planet!"
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_2: "GreenPathAI offers truly different experiences, off the beaten path, with a real positive impact."
TESTIMONIALS.TESTIMONIAL_3: "The AI helped me design a nature-friendly tour suitable for the whole family. Awesome!"

CTA.STEP_1: I discover tours and select my preferences
CTA.STEP_2: I receive personalized suggestions from the AI
CTA.STEP_3: I enjoy a responsible and memorable experience!

TEAM.TITLE: Committed team
TEAM.FOUNDER_DESC: Led by Mayssa Jrad, GreenPathAI invites you to dare sustainable and inspiring tourism!
